title: kanda purANattai
sahitya:
kanda purANattaik-kavinpera isaittavan kavi kunjara bhArati vAzhgavE


anupallavi

  tIntamizh isaittiDa dinam dinam tUNDi en cintai kuLira vanda canda mighu pulavan


caraNam    avamAna cintaigaL aTriDak-kaTravan ANDavan aruLukkE ALAna naTravan 
shiva murugA SaNmukhA sendil vaDivElA enrE japittu nIraLittAlE janmappiNI vilagum
